data.title: We Are Makers Who Make A Difference
data.text:
READ OUR 2024 BEAUTY AND PERSONAL CARE TREND REPORT

READ REPORT

READ OUR 2024 BEAUTY AND PERSONAL CARE TREND REPORT

READ REPORT

WHO MAKE A DIFFERENCE

ACCUPAC

We Are Makers

From formulation to manufacturing we serve the most trusted brands in the beauty and personal care industries with a wide range of cosmetic, over-the-counter and medical devices across skincare, haircare, oral care and healthcare products.

But beyond that, we make a difference. We make a difference in the lives of our people, we make a difference in the community around us, we make a difference in the health of our planet for a better, brighter, more beautiful future for all.

Watch our capabilities video to learn more.

product manufacturing, pharmaceutical manufacturing, packaging and manufacturing, contract manufacturing, manufacturing companies, medical device contract manufacturing companies, packaging manufacturing company, manufacturing company near me, product development and manufacturing, disruptive innovation, contract manufacturing company, manufacturing service, manufacturing services company, Health Care Innovation, help with product development, skin care manufacturing company, private label manufacturers, innovative production technologies, product manufacturing services, manufacturing and innovation, cosmetic development, manufacturing as a service, contract production, cosmetic manufacturers, third party manufacturing pharma companies, skincare manufacturing labs, product formulation companies, contract manufacturing companies in usa, Wellness Products Manufacturing, skin care formulation, contract pharma, personal care product manufacturing, new technology in manufacturing industry, Skin Care Innovation, health care products manufacturers, makeup formul, product manufacturing companies near me, cosmetic manufacturing labs, packaging contract manufacturing, cosmetic makers, Hair Care Innovation, cream formulation, liquid manufacturing, Personal Care Manufacturing

CAPABILITIES:

FORMULATION, MANUFACTURING AND PACKAGING EXPERTISE

With over 50 years of experience, we partner with some of the most trusted brands in the world.

CUSTOMER SERVICE:

DEDICATED PROJECT MANAGEMENT

We act as an extension of your team from concept through to commercialization with support across formulation, procurement, manufacturing, packaging and storage.

QUALITY ASSURANCE:

BACKED BY ROBUST QUALITY SYSTEMS

Our cGMP, FDA Registered and ISO Certified facilities have in-house robust Analytical testing and Microbiology capabilities.

OUR FACILITIES

MAINLAND, PA

LAKEWOOD, NJ

SOUDERTON, PA

HARLEYSVILLE, PA

COBALT LABS

Innovation

A division of Accupac focused on new product development and innovation services in the beauty and personal care industries with a wide range of cosmetic, over-the-counter, and medical device capabilities in skincare, haircare, oral care and health care.

ACCUPAC

Capabilities

Our unique innovation, manufacturing, and packaging capabilities help build the supply of beauty and personal care products across the globe.

ACCUPAC

Our Commitments

As your CDMO partner, we are dedicated to working like we are a part of your brand’s team and our ambition is to ensure your sustainability efforts are consistently enabled, supported and accelerated through our own.

JOIN OUR TEAM

Careers

Accupac offers a meaningful work environment where you can make a difference. Our culture is rooted in inclusivity, safety and engagement, ensuring that we continue operating and fostering an environment where all our people can thrive. Join the Accupac Team today to act boldly, think bigger, and win together.

“From formulation to scale up to manufacturing and filling, the ability to provide a full suite of services, solve complex packaging and manufacturing challenges, and to deliver superior quality at an accelerated speed is what truly makes Accupac unique.”

Chad Holzer, CEO

“We've developed a customer centric culture at Accupac, which means we dedicate an entire team to be fully empowered to listen to what our customers problems are, what their needs are, and work together to try to accomplish them.”

Rick Terrill, Chief Commercial Officer

“From Trend forecasting and concept creation to product development and testing, we offer a full suite of services to help brands bring their ideas to life.”

Michelle Chavez, VP of Innovation

“We've built the foundation to grow both through the investments in our facility but also the team that we built here at Accupac. So truly, we're making more than just a product; we're making a difference in terms of how our customers view their capabilities, making sure that consumers get what they need and providing solutions that make a difference in everyday lives.”

Chad Holzer, CEO

“Our commitment to ESG is really an extension of our purpose. We recognize that our customers have a broader commitment to the world and their consumers and that's important to us. And we recognize that shared responsibility to make a difference together.”

Katie Gillespie, Chief Human Resources Officer

NEWS ROOM

Unleashing Innovation with a CDMO

Why contract development and manufacturing organizations should be an integral part of your product development strategy for 2024.

Watch our capabilities video to learn more.
